EmailTemplate.name: 201902_EMEAI_HAPP_3rd_Party_Avionics_MC.201902_Email1_EMEAI_HAPP_3rd_Party_Avion
EmailTemplate.subject: More Reasons to be HAPPy
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear Customer, Get the same Peace of Mind for your 3rd Party Avionics as you have with your Honeywell Avionics Protection Plan (HAPP). We are delighted to be able to share some exciting news with you. Honeywell can now offer an even more comprehensive service for HAPP customers by partnering with Universal Avionics to cover a variety of your UA equipment. Featuring the same benefits you know and love with HAPP, this extended offer from Honeywell is designed to give you more reasons to be HAPPy. To find out more click the link.
FIND OUT MOREÂ <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/HAPP_3rd_Party_Avionics.html]]>
